The AI Clinic Blog

The AI Clinic blog features posts from our team and guest authors on a variety of topics related to language models, general-purpose AI, and public interest technology.

The DeepSeek Dilemma

Robert Wolfe
February 4, 2025

DeepSeek R1 surprised the world with the first open-weight reasoning model. How should researchers be using it?

Research on Demand?

Bill Howe
February 3, 2025

Amid the promises of Deep Research to automate even more white collar tasks, how should researchers adapt?

About The AI Clinic

The AI Clinic is an initiative of the UW iSchool to make language models more approachable in research.
